word:
MR No. 595 - Avondale College 1894-1900

     We have now reached an important time in the history of our school in Australia. We should find a more suitable location. As yet the providence of God has not opened the way for us to move from the city to a more favorable place. We are waiting, and watching, and working.--Ms 18, 1892, p. 6. ("Bought With a Price," December, 1892.)
